name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Bomber the Rolling Stone
summary: AboutYou accidentally triggered a trap organ. From time to time there will be huge Rolling Stones in the cave, if crushed by the Rolling Stones, there is only one way to die. Watch out for arrow symbols, and the Rolling Stones will appear from here.
